content: w&t each needle 60 sts total repeat row 7 and 8 until all stitches have been knit with their wraps foot setup round knit all sole sts m1l k to end of gusset decreases round 31 sts for top of foot round 1 k1 ssk k until 3 sts before end of sole round 1 knit all sole sts p1 k2tog yo k1 yo k1 ssk p1 until end of round knit instep in pattern prefer a chart the lace chart included below round 2 knit sole stitches knit instep in pattern contains a the lace repeat as written between the repeat row 1 and 2 four times 61 sts remain-- 30 parentheses for rounds 1-4 sole sts 31 instep stitches rounds 2-4 knit all sole sts p1 k5 p1 until end next round k1 ssk k to end of sole knit instep of round in pattern repeat rounds 1-4 until sock measures about 3 60 sts remain on needles from heel for the size 7 socks pictured this was about 5 3/4 from the toe or 14 pattern repeats cuff k1 p1 around for 5 rounds mini gusset round 1 k1 m1l k until 1 heel st remains m1r finishing k1 knit across instep in pattern bobble loosely weave in ends using tapestry needle round 2 knit across sole sts knit instep in pattern repeat row 1 and 2 three more times 8 sts increased-- you will now have 38 sole sts lace chart short row heel row 1 k until 1 sole st remains w&t row 2 purl until 1 st before beginning of round w&t pattern and photos copyright 2016 ashley dorian medwig please do not sell items made using this pattern abbreviations m1l insert left needle tip from front to back underneath bar before the next stitch then knit into the back of it one stitch increased m1r insert left needle tip from back to front underneath bar before the next stitch then knit it one stitch increased k2tog bringing the tip of the right needle up through two stitches on the left needle knitting them together as if they were one stitch one stitch decreased pm place marker w&t wrap and turn right side rs row - move yarn to the front of your work as if to purl - slip one stitch purlwise from the left needle to right needle - move your yarn to the back of the work as if to knit - slip the stitch that you moved to your right needle back onto your left needle - flip your work to begin a ws row - continue as directed by pattern wrong side ws row - move yarn to the back of your work as if to knit - slip one stitch purlwise from the left needle to right needle - move your yarn to the front of your work as if to purl - slip the stitch that you moved to your right needle back onto your left needle
